headline: Republic Services Adds Coca-Cola FEMSA CEO To Guide Growth And Sustainability
summary: Republic Services (NYSE:RSG) appointed Ian Craig, CEO of Coca-Cola FEMSA, to its board of directors. Craig brings experience in international operations, digital transformation, and sustainability to the company. His background includes leading major operational, sustainability, and M&A initiatives at Coca-Cola FEMSA. For you as an investor looking at NYSE:RSG, this move adds a board member with direct experience in running large scale international operations and managing complex supply...
